entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning then south 60 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
